item.title: Machine Learning Frameworks
item.description: HUGOMORE42 Machine Learning Frameworks Creation of frameworks is one of the most important advances in practical machine learning involved the creation of frameworks. Many aspects of developing Frameworks are automated by machine learning applications, allowing developers to re-use code and take advantage of best practices. This post introduces five of the most popular frameworks: Torch Theano Caffe Keras TensorFlow Torch Torch originally released in 2002 by Ronan Collobert for the purpose of numeric computing.
